name: Aderlo Cashback Coin
description: Aderlo Cashback Coin (ACC) is an innovative Binance blockchain-based token aimed at transforming the e-commerce industry by integrating loyalty and rewards into a seamless digital experience. ACC acts as a cashback system, rewarding customers who make purchases on the ECAT eCommerce platform. Through the use of blockchain, it provides a transparent, secure, and efficient way for users to earn rewards, which can be redeemed for future purchases, saved as an investment, or traded on cryptocurrency exchanges. ACC supports a sustainable ecosystem, offering benefits to both consumers and merchants, while fostering growth within the digital economy.
